rows.label: qst700905_msg0001
rows.name:
They gave me a fright!
What was that, just now?

rows.label: qst700905_msg0002
rows.name:
Say, this wasn't the first time we were
neck-deep in Gogols, right? Is that
coincidence? I don't think so.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't think I'm ready to joke about it
yet, personally.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0004
rows.name:
But they may have been the relatives
of the Gogols we fought earlier...
They're definitely driven...

rows.label: qst700905_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah... It's hard to think they were
actually storming the city. I think
your theory is the more valid one.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0006
rows.name: Wh-whoa...

rows.label: qst700905_msg0007
rows.name:
Hrm. Looks like we got some fans
while we weren't looking.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0008
rows.name:
Sorry you had to wait!
Is everyone OK?!

rows.label: qst700905_msg0009
rows.name: Hale and hearty, as you can see.

rows.label: qst700905_msg0010
rows.name:
Gwahahaha!
So we didn't have to rush after all.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00011
rows.name:
Still, that was a job well done.
Agate did good bringing us here.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00012
rows.name:
Say, I don't suppose you feel like
joining my little team? We can always
use more skilled fighters.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00013
rows.name:
I'm honored by the invitation, really
I am. But what would happen to this
guard post then?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00014
rows.name:
Gwahahaha!
All right, ya got a point.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00015
rows.name:
Hmm... How about we put Chalcedony
back on guard duty, and have Agate
join the main team?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00016
rows.name:
Hold on a moment. Why can't they
both serve together? Didn't you say
you wanted more skilled fighters?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00017
rows.name:
Well, see, guarding the gates to the
capital is the foundation of our duties.
It's not like just anyone could do it.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00018
rows.name:
I think for sure that one of the siblings
needs to stay here.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00019
rows.name:
In that case, it's simple.
I'll be fine here, so my kid brother can...

rows.label: qst700905_msg00020
rows.name:
...You know, I hate it when you do that.
Stop acting all goody-goody, bro.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00021
rows.name: Chalcy, what are you talking about?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00022
rows.name:
You think you always have to take
the back seat, right? Just 'cause you're
older, you have to be all nice to me?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00023
rows.name:
Well, pthooie to that! It only makes
you feel good, and I'm sick of it.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00024
rows.name:
I'm sorry to butt in here, but there's
one thing I have to say.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00025
rows.name:
Do you really want to bicker like this?
If the fighting breaks out tomorrow,
you might never see each other again.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00026
rows.name:
If you don't end tonight on a good note,
you could regret it for the rest of your
lives.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00028
rows.name:
...She's right.
There's no guarantee that peace
will return anytime soon.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00029
rows.name:
I didn't quite realize that before.
I'm really sorry.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00030
rows.name: Me too... I said a bit too much.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00031
rows.name:
Sarge, I've got a request.
Could I please get a demotion?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00032
rows.name:
I wanna cool my head, take a tour
at the gates again. See if I can do
better this time round.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00033
rows.name:
Ohhh? That's sudden.
You sure, son?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00034
rows.name:
Yes, sir. There might be another
attack like we had today...

rows.label: qst700905_msg00035
rows.name: If my bro is here alone, I'll be worried.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00036
rows.name:
Aw...
You're not just saying that, are you?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00037
rows.name:
...I told you to cut it out, didn't I?
Just treat me like a regular squad mate,
standing duty together. All right?

rows.label: qst700905_msg00038
rows.name:
We'll share the burden and work
arm in arm, like brothers should.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00039
rows.name:
I'm...I'm sorry.
I don't think I understood until now
how I made you feel.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00040
rows.name:
That's 'cause you're dumb, Nii-san.
Go on, just say "thank you" and
let's be done with it.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00041
rows.name:
*Sniffle* *sniffle*
I love a happy ending...

rows.label: qst700905_msg00042
rows.name: Oh, get a grip.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00043
rows.name:
I feel like the next time Gogols come,
you guys will be ready for them.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00044
rows.name: Oh, anything but those!

rows.label: qst700905_msg00045
rows.name:
Gwahaha! Well, any way you cut it,
at least we'll feel safe with such expert
gate guards keeping watch.

rows.label: qst700905_msg00046
rows.name:
*sigh*
Looks like I'll have to start recruiting
squad members from scratch...
